name: CHEETAHMEN Demo
description:
THEY'RE BACK!

FATE OF THE CHEETAHMEN: CYGORE'S LABYRINTH is a cursed project that exists because I thought the first part of Action 52 Cheetahmen that plays like a Beat 'Em Up could be made to be good - and then I thought I'd combine it with a custom dungeon traversal system a bit like Smash TV.

FEATURES:

  • Local Co-op
  • Beat-em-Up X Dungeon Crawl gameplay, inspired by Guardic for MSX
  • Stat Boost items like in King's Knight for NES
  • Plenty of Cygore's robots to beat up
  • A boss fight
  • Actual Cheetahmen music "borrowed" with zero regrets
